welcome.title: Welcome to
welcome.subTitle: Tashtiba
welcome.description: Your one-stop shop for all your needs - exclusive discounts, fast delivery, and unbeatable offers!

AboutSection.heading: Everything You Need to Finish Your Dream Home – All in One Place!
AboutSection.description:
Welcome to Tashtiba, your first destination for high-quality and affordable home finishing and furnishing solutions. We offer a complete range of products including doors (wood and metal), lighting (indoor and outdoor), home furniture (modern and classic), decorations, faucets and sanitary ware, plumbing installation and finishing, as well as electrical tools, tiles, ceramics, and other essential building materials.

At Tashtiba, we ensure the latest designs and premium quality materials, with fast delivery across Full coverage across Cairo and Giza and expert support to help you choose the right products for your needs. Whether you’re starting from scratch or renovating your home, you’ll find everything you need in one place.
AboutSection.alt: Tashtiba | Modern and Elegant Living Room
